Message.Translation:
Oh, I can see the vision of the Master - </ Translation> </ Message>
My strength, I want to demonstrate even under you </ Translation> </ Message>
Oh - this is a fateful encounter </ Translation> </ Message>
If you can do your best under the guidance of you -! There is no pleasure over it </ Translation> </ Message>
This encounter -! I feel the bond between me and the awakening man. </ Translation> </ Message>
It is full of stimulation of creation here </ Translation> </ Message>
Oh! Let me show off, my skill You will get </ Translation> </ Message>
Awesome - the best environment for creating things </ Translation> </ Message>
I'm looking forward to showing finished products </ Translation> </ Message>
To hurry things in a hurry, say that, etc. </ Translation> </ Message>
What is fascinating to make things </ Translation> </ Message>
I will reflect on you - More, - more devoted! </ Translation> </ Message>
Oh, what is that - I will let you go to the opposite world -! I will surely take back this lost point, </ Translation> </ Message>
Sorry It is said that it falls down in such a place It was uncertain - </ Translation> </ Message> </ Resource>
